metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27021 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was discovered in Puppet DB, this flaw results in an escalation of privileges which allows the user to delete tables via an SQL query.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-27021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

puppet-terminus-puppetdb - 7.12.1-3
puppetdb - 7.12.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: puppetdb package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.12.1-3').
